subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: The Friars got two third-period goals — one of them a spectacular fluke — and held on Saturday night to defeat Boston University, 4-3, and win their first Division I hockey championship.
snippet: The Friars got two third-period goals — one of them a spectacular fluke — and held on Saturday night to defeat Boston University, 4-3, and win their first Division I hockey championship.
